com.tedros.fxapi.annotation.reader

Annotation Type TTextReaderHtml


  • @Retention(value=RUNTIME)
@Target(value=FIELD)
public @interface TTextReaderHtml
     Mark the field as a Reader type.
 
 A reader type field is builded only when the user set the view to reader mode.
 
 Types supported:
 
 SimpleStringProperty, SimpleBooleanProperty, SimpleLongProperty, 
 SimpleDoubleProperty, SimpleFloatProperty, SimpleIntegerProperty, 
  and SimpleObjectProperty 
 
 Note: 
 
 A field of ITEntity type in an entity class can be configured as 
 SimpleObjectProperty<ITEntity> at the ITModelView representation.
    Author:
    Davis Gordon

      • text

        public abstract java.lang.String text
         Text Class
 
  Sets the value of the property text. 
  
  Property description: 
  
  Defines text string that is to be displayed. 
  
  Default value: empty string
        Default:
        ""

      • htmlTemplateForControlValue

        public abstract java.lang.String htmlTemplateForControlValue
          Define a html to wrap the control value. 
  
  Important: The key %STYLE% and %CONTENT% must in the html string to 
  be replaced.
  
  Default value: <span id='contentControlValue' style='%STYLE%'>%CONTENT%</span>
        Default:
        "<span id=\'%ID%\' name=\'%NAME%\' style=\'%STYLE%\'>%CONTENT%</span>"

      • cssForControlValue

        public abstract java.lang.String cssForControlValue
          Sets a css string to be used at the tag defined in htmlTemplateForControlValue(). 
  
  Default value: margin:2px;
        Default:
        "margin:2px;"

      • cssForLabelValue

        public abstract java.lang.String cssForLabelValue
          Sets a css string to be used at the tag which will represent a label. 
  
  Default value: font-weight: bold; margin:2px;
        Default:
        "font-weight: bold; margin:2px;"

      • cssForHtmlBox

        public abstract java.lang.String cssForHtmlBox
          Sets a css string to be used at the tag which will wrap a value of a control and his label.
  
  Default value: margin:4px;
        Default:
        "padding:8px;"

      • cssForContentValue

        public abstract java.lang.String cssForContentValue
          Sets a css string to be used at the tag that wraps the content in the html box, 
  a html box is used to layout the control value and his label.
  
  Default value: margin:1px;
        Default:
        "margin:1px;"

      • booleanValues

        public abstract TStringBooleanValues booleanValues
          Specifies a description for string boolean representation.
  
    Valid String booleans for True value: T, t, True, TRUE, true or 1;
    Valid String booleans for False value: F, f, False, FALSE, false or 0;
  
  Default value: @TBooleanValues(falseValue = "#{tedros.fxapi.label.false}", trueValue = "#{tedros.fxapi.label.true}")
        Default:
        @com.tedros.fxapi.annotation.TStringBooleanValues(trueCodes="", falseCodes="")
